segments.text: Hi there , I want to reserve a hotel room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem at all . Could I have your full name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi , Mr . Sandals . I'm Michelle , at your service . When do you need the room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My plans are to be there April 14th to the 17th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have new room rates , sir . Will that be acceptable to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it depends on the price , of course . What is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no problem with that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! Would you prefer smoking or nonsmoking ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely nonsmoking . I can't handle that smell .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nonsmoking . Now , is a queen-size bed okay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great , Mr . Sandals . Your reservation is confirmed . Now all I need is your phone number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you so much , Mr . Sandals . We look forward to seeing you !
segments.speaker: S2
